lore: Tipsy Denizens are notorious drinkers, never without their bottle of fermented seaweed and rarely ever sober. They stagger across the reefs, laughing and singing in a language few surface dwellers understand. Despite their unsteady gait, their wild moves have sunk more corsairs than Rodia's navy is willing to admit. If you see one toasting alone, don't even think about interrupting.
menagerieDialog: (It clicks its jaws twice, then stares through you like a dying fish.)
(It gurgles softly, then slaps a wet limb against the wall in what you assume is a gesture of approval. Maybe.)
(You find it chewing on something unidentifiable. You hope it's not one of your other creatures.)
(It's dripping a strange fluid onto the floor. Your other creatures wisely keep their distance.)
(Its jaw unhinges briefly, revealing rows of teeth spiraling inward. You're not sure if itâ€™s yawning or threatening you.)
name: Tipsy Denizen
